body: Spells with opposite effects apply normally, with all bonuses, penalties, or changes accruing in the order that they apply. Some spells negate or counter each other. This is a special effect that is noted in a spell's description.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic/Casting Spells/Combining Magic Effects/Spells with Opposite Effects
name: Spells with Opposite Effects
